titleInfo.title: Letter No. 50 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports news from Persia that Ally Morad Cahn [Ali Murad Khan] has now broken his allegiance with Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan] and is waiting until winter ends to approach Schyras [Shiraz] with his forces. Various administrative and financial affairs are discussed before Beaumont - due to an indifferent state of health - requests permission to return to Bombay and leave his post in Bushire. Shipped by Bunderick [Bandar-e Rig] Dow.
